title: “Intentional disconnecting”
text: Whenever I get voted out I usually just leave. Every single time I do it though it won’t let me play. It won’t let me go online for “intentional disconnecting” which shouldn’t even be a thing in the first place. So this is the reason nobody plays among us. The decisions you make are literally garbage.

title: Game invites
text: So here’s the thing, your buddies can you send you a game invite but if you don’t join right away, you could either be told game already started or lobby is full. Now that’s fine, bc that’s how among us servers work but, the invite disappears after that🫤 so you can’t get back to that game unless you track it down and find it somehow.

title: SUPER Fan, Would love some more Updates
text:
Absolutely love this game. It’s the whole App game to have ever captured my interest in the way it does. I play before bed and dream of sussing out impostors. 

Would LOVE to see :
-EVEN more customization, especially clothing wise
-Mega Maps with 20-30 people with maybe 4-5 imp maximums
-More intricate roles. Both for Crew and Impostor. 
-In Game Proximity Chat. We have ‘Free Chat’ and ‘Quick Chat’, would LOVE to see voice chat. (With consideration to ages of player accounts of course)
